products.title: Day & Night Brushed Oyster
products.description: The day & night brushed oyster roller blind is a practical and stylish alternative to a venetian blind. The textured sandy-coloured stripes makes this blind a great choice for a more neutral interior. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Pearl
products.description: The day & night brushed pearl roller blind will add both practicality and personality to your window. Its golden beige stripes give it a unique aesthetic, perfect for neutrally styled interiors. This is a great alternative to a traditional venetian blind and will look great in any window you put it in. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of the basswood is clearly visible. Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look. Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme. Craft a subtle colour palette of pale greys and soft creams, adding the occasional hint of vintage pink for some characterful hue.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coordinated, so that nothing can detract from this designer aesthetic. Craft a polished country look in the living room by matching the jacobean oak with a burnt orange shade on a feature wall.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detailing - everything from hand-painted slat ends to woven linen taping. Transform a dull hallway into an airy and spacious welcoming by melding the spanish cedar with cream or white walls and opting for country-style woods throughout.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for a new layer of colour that flows gently around any room. We love the idea of use kalmar ridgeback in the conservatory where the increased window space compared to other rooms will allow ridgeback to really set the tone.

products.title: Hive Blackout Geo Oyster Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackoutgeooyster perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hive geoblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Gingko Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: The ginko dove grey roman blind is an exquisitely delicate embroidered pattern in a stylish grey which will look great whichever room you prefer. Use it as a legitimate feature across tall, ornate windows in lounges down to accentuating a smaller window on a staircase. The fabric will fall in careless folds without creasing further emphasising the softness of this embroidered blind. Product id: db-rom1109 fabric colour: dove grey material: 91% polyester 9% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Fabio Cream Roman Blind
products.description: The fabio roman blind in a natural cream flawlessly ties the outside with your interior. Weve added interest by looping through metallics and textures, but the effect is subtle so while you have a clean, warm, pattern, it wont overwhelm your room. The colourway will tone down bright lounges or enhance plain halls, making these blinds an investment in your future. Product id: db-rom1108 fabric colour: cream material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Fabio Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the outside in, with textured flowers, leaves and trees which blend with earthy tones to tie any room together. Woven with subtle metallics to lift the pattern and boost interest without overpowering the rest of your home. Youll find the fabio dove grey roman blind a splendid addition to your living room, entrances and particularly soothing for bedrooms. Product id: db-rom1107 fabric colour: dove grey material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Dragonfly Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Pull out the tender greens of the hand sketched dragonflies on the dragonfly roman blind by pairing it against strong surfaces. Or add a dash of humour to a serious space such as an office or bathroom. This incredibly versatile blind is further enhanced because weve invested in a deluxe blend of cotton and linen meaning that the fabric breathes so you can confidently hang it throughout your home.

products.title: Chic Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Lovingly stitched with a striped bark effect, weve spun a metallic thread through the chic roman blind which flawlessly matches the dove grey colour way. The overall effect is one of warmth as the texture of this blind glitters as the folds catch the diverse shades of light while not overwhelming the other decor in your room. Perfectly placed in living rooms and halls. Product id: db-rom1103 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Chic Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Do you have a rustic home that needs luxurious window coverings without conflicting with exposed brickwork or historical features? Then look no further than the chic roman blind in the linen colourway. Dont be fooled, this fabric wont crease, we've spun it from an indulgent fabric which falls in glorious loose folds while the matching metallic yarn glitters in the sunshine. Product id: db-rom1104 fabric colour: linen material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Artichoke Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Their artichoke design, inspired by the favourite european vegetable, blends reds and greens together on a light cream linen background to create a classic pattern with a modern twist. Perfect for adding flair to a kitchen or dining room. A cotton/linen blend fabric, makes this roman blind breathable and light - wonderful for temperature regulation. Not only is this roman blind made in yorkshire by us, we also offer a fantastic five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Bumblebee Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: The clarke & clarke bumblebee fabric is on trend for todays living. Available in four colourways the design will bring a little nature to your interior without being stung on price. In an ivory colour this blind is suitable for both the traditional and contemporary home as a focal feature or layered with contrasting curtains for the fuller look. We pride ourselves on their manufacturing since quality is important to us.

products.title: Acacia Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the outdoors in with the acacia dove grey roman blind in a smart grey. Custom made from textured fabric highlighted with sprinkles of metallic, weve hand picked this collection to boost not only warmth in your room, but also to add a style youll be appreciative of in years to come. Product id: db-rom1089 fabric colour: dove grey material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Elegant pearl curtains, a median between their white and ivory, uses a light touch of cream to create a soft off-white tone. products.title: Osborne, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne smoke is a modern reinterpretation of a classically patterned design that takes its inspiration from the beautiful free-flowing forms of natural plant-life. A gentle grey is used to print the design onto the off-white background, giving this version of the osborne a lovely, smoky aesthetic. The smoke works beautifully as a lightener in rooms where darker features dominate, without challenging the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Riviera Stripe, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The riviera stripe smoke is a top quality, lightweight fabric, woven into the most contemporary of modern and eye-catching designs. Giving a full range of grey shades from charcoal, through fashionable stone greys, to a simple and pure off-white, the smoke is sure to be a great addition to your home. The colours on offer in the smoke work well as a way of adding a real depth of colour to a lightly decorated living room or front hallway.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.title: Ivory Perfect Fit
products.description: This ivory perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Perforated Cream Filtra Perfect Fit
products.description: This perforated cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: This cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Real Wood Almond White Perfect Fit
products.description: The almond white perfect fit works well with tones of grey, mushroom and stone, adding a dash of light cream to a room to balance darker furnishings. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Sandstone White Perfect Fit
products.description: A slightly less intense white than their real wood lightbox white, this sandstone white gives a clean feel to any room. Can be used to make a subtle contrast to white walls, or as a statement piece with other neutral tones. Perfect for windows such as those within conservatories or with protruding handles. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Double Cream Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Rigid aluminium slats are beautifully showcased in double cream gloss, a soft and sumptuous hue with a high-beam shine. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Fagel Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: Their fagel range will add the cosy feel to your home. This range comes in many colours which would suit any room. Revamp your home with the soft fabric and lovely colour of the fagel ivory roman blind. Product id: db-arom0531 fabric colour: ivory control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes fagel ivory roman blind in white/cream.

products.title: Missprint Blackout Little Trees Egg Shell
products.description: Roller blinds made to measure blackout roller blind missprint blackout little trees egg shell made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired degree. Invite country sophistication into your home by teaming the oyster with vintage pinks and an accenting sage green in the master bedroom. Include light, naked woods and dreamy florals, dressing the bed linen with plush chenille throws and cushions for an added touch of luxe.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to let in as much or as little light and air as you need. Build a stunningly unusual decor scheme in your home office by setting the smoke grey against a navy blue feature wall. Paint the remaining walls in white or matching pale grey and furnish the room with grey furniture and navy accessories.

products.title: Surin Linen
products.description: Surin linen made to measure roman blind surin linen made to measure roman blind.

products.title: Evergreen Linen

products.title: Mayfair, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the contemporary mayfair in ivory within any dcor scheme for a fresh and elegant effect. Supple, fine threads create a nimble and relaxed, cotton-like cloth that works to form an effortless blind with simple style and a sophisticated finish. Blend the ivory with sumptuous linens in alike and gentle shades of silk and biscuit to craft an inviting surrounding, draping the blind in a rich royal blue to both frame the modern hue and introduce a striking burst of contrasting colour.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Luna Softshade Cream Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make the most of natural light in your home without compromising on privacy with the luna softshade cream day and night roller blind. This design of alternating beige fabric and voile strips looks clean and modern for accessorising any setting whilst the innovative opening and closing function allows light to penetrate at the same time as giving you a sense of peace and seclusion. products.description: A beautiful combination of twilight/jewel greens, purples and pinks. This 100% cotton butterfly botanist carmine curtain fabric mixes eye-catching contemporary design with a saturated colour palette to create these stunning curtains. These curtains will look beautiful paired with light sage greens and natural wooden tones throughout the home, a perfect addition for dining/ living areas within the home.

products.title: Asteroid Ivory Curtain
products.description: At an affordable price, these beautiful asteroid blinds come in 8 natural colours which look perfect in any home. The abstract design of these cream curtains is perfect to add style and flair to any room in your home as well as neutrality. products.title: Art Deco Linen Curtain
products.description: A contemporary touch on a classic art-deco design, the 100% cotton-blend art deco linen curtain is a timeless piece that can be added to any neutral toned room to add a sense of sophistication and style. At swift direct blinds we always put quality first, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching roman. products.title: Autumn Wood Butterscotch Curtain
products.description: The autumn wood butterscotch curtain features everything that we love about this autumnal season from bushy-tailed orange foxes, spikey brown hedgehogs and enchanting owls. Also scattered around this design are tiny animal footprints and little acorns all printed on the soft cream 100% cotton-based fabric. This curtain is a firm favourite and will go down a hit with little ones. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Langden, Linen - Roman Blind
products.description: If you love light green shades but find limes a little overpowering for your home, the langden in linen could be the roman blind for you. The subtlest shade of mint green, melded with pure white, forms a retro-hippy, paisley-like pattern with a little colour and a lot of character. Give your home office a crisp, linen lift by surrounding this roman blind with white walls and smaller amounts of minty green.

products.title: Sayuri, Linen - Roman Blind
products.description: Creamy white and lime green take centre stage in this cool, calm, and collected offering from the sayuri range. The linen's painted floral pattern is pretty and wistful, providing an attractively chic addition to any room. Create calming luxe to your family bathroom by adding the linen to a white suite with matching snow tiles, and including pops of matching lime throughout the room in items such as towels, bath mats, and ornaments.
